description: Updates the metadata or encryption settings of a session. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the session to modify. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: sessionMetadata
parameters.description: A map of key-value pairs containing attributes to be persisted across the session. For example the user's ID, their language preference, and the type of device they are using. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the session was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the session was last modified.

nested_items.name: sessionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the session that was updated.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the session you updated.

nested_items.name: sessionStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the session you updated.
